tbColumnFilter directive in tubular.directives

The tbColumnFilter directive is a the basic filter popover. You need to define it inside a tbColumn.

The parent scope will provide information about the data type.

Directive's attributes

Param Type Details
title string

Set the popover title.
text string

Set the search text.
operator string

Set the initial operator, default depends on data type.
argument object

Set the argument.
onlyContains boolean

Set if the operator selector should show, default false.
